bio:treatment.discussion: Marsilea ancylopoda is not currently known to be extant in the flora; it was known at least at the turn of the century from a single locality in peninsular Florida. Other collections from Florida are M . vestita , are of questionable identity or have not been seen by the author. The subterranean sporocarps of M . ancylopoda are unique among the New World species of the genus.
